parameter.name: prefab
parameter.description: A game object prefab used to initialize the game object

parameter.name: gameObject
parameter.description: An existing game object to attach to

parameter.name: parent
parameter.description: The parent of this game object

parameter.name: position
parameter.description: The center of the game object

parameter.name: up
parameter.description: The direction the top of the game object faces

parameter.name: gameObject
parameter.description: The game object this effect is attached to

parameter.name: position
parameter.description: The position of the game object

parameter.name: up
parameter.description: The direction the top of the game object faces

parameter.name: layer
parameter.description: The collision layer this game object is on
